document.full_text: joan rivers, the host of e!'s "fashion police" and we's "joan & melissa: joan knows best?," lets loose on charlie sheen's "torpedo of truth" tour and other hot topics.
document.title: joan rivers: charlie sheen's act "two bimbo sluts"
